original_text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him, so that he went into a ship, and sat; and the whole multitude stood on the shore.
korean_text: 큰 무리가 그에게로 모여 들거늘 예수께서 배에 올라가 앉으시고 온 무리는 해변에 서 있더니

sentences.original_text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him
so that he went into a ship
and whole multitude stood on the shore
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 무리는 해변에 서 있었다
